qas.question: Where is St. Brendan's school located?
What was St. Brendan's school previously named?
What is the only school in the country implementing three international Baccalaureate Programmes?

context: Located in <a0_0>Cordon<a0_0/>, <a2_0>St.Brendan´s school<a2_0/>, before named <a1_0>St.Catherine´s<a1_0/> is a non-profit civil association, which has a solid institutional culture with a clear vision of the future. It is knowned for being one of the best schools in the country, joining students from the wealthiest parts of Montevideo, such us, Punta Carretas, Pocitos, Malvin and Carrasco. St. Brendan’s School is a bilingual, non-denominational school that promotes a pedagogical constructivist approach focused on the child as a whole. In this approach, understanding is built from the connections children make between their own prior knowledge and the learning experiences, thus developing critical thinking skills. It is also the only school in the country implementing the three International Baccalaureate Programmes. These are:
